name: Cartoon Stickman Jump And Run: Coin Collect Free
name_original: Cartoon Stickman Jump And Run: Coin Collect Free
description:
Keep jumping and keep your eyes on things falling down. That is life. – stickman who survives longest

Tilt iPhone to let stickman move. Tap on the screen to let the stickman jump. Also, collect coins when you can. Never touch skeletons. Keep in mind that turtles will slow you down. Most important, have fun! :-)

Highlights:
•Addictive gameplay, easy and fun
•Tilt iPhone to move
•Mass treasure to collect
•Bloody skeleton waiting ahead
•Difficulty will increase as the game continue
•Well-designed graphics and sounds
•Game Center Support
•It’s FREE!!!
